title: My CS riven skin is missing??
body:
I remember buying this skin when it was re released a few months back, and i haven't played Riven in a while, until yesterday, i came to play her and the skin is locked ????

I tried to check my purchase history but it only shows the last 3 months :( can a Riot person please check my account and let me know what is going on?

replies.body:
Hey summoner,

Since it is an account specific inquiry and we can't really help you out on the boards. You should send in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to Riot and they can help you from there :D
From now its basically a waiting game.

Here are some guidelines for submitting a support ticket that will ensure the smoothest and fastest response possible:

> Please create a max of 1 ticket about this issue, and do not try to add any information afterwards/submit multiple as it will bump it to the back of the queue. It can take up to 7 business days for them to get back to you (although majority of tickets are answered within 48 hours), so be patient
